attributes.action: New policies on deporting legal and illegal migrants & full ECHR withdrawal
attributes.additional_details:
1. Deport any and all foreign criminals, and any family that may be with them in the UK
2. Reassess all rights to remain and/or citizenship granted since 2000 with a view to deporting any (and any UK born dependents), based on their contribution to national life or the economy
3. Full and immediate immigration freeze.
4. Full ECHR withdrawal.
5. Removal of all benefit access to any immigrants for their whole lifetime.
6. Automatically deport any immigrants who are out of work for more than 3 months.
attributes.background: Some research has suggested that the share of the British population that is White British may be a minority by the end of this century. We believe that reasonable concerns about this are dismissed as racism. We want the government to take the following steps in response.
